name: Bottledodge
description:
The ocean is filled with much trash, become a fish and try to avoid trash as you swim to the surface of the sea.
Dodge the bottles, Get the Coins.
For support email: games.cobwebblox@outlook.com

Controls

A = left
D = right

Made by

Made by @cobwebblox
Level 4 co-made by https://twitter.com/hiphophej2/  
Level 7 co-made by https://twitter.com/vin_the_noob/ 
Beta testing by @vin_the_noob  @fnafatronic  @hiphophej2

Install instructions (Windows ONLY)
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on VisualScriptingGame.exe
  • Enjoy
